messages.messageBody:
I'm sorry, but this list is for the sharing of stories and artwork on the
Shinsengumi. Historical questions should be directed to the SHQ list please.

Thank you

-MissBehavin

messages.messageBody:
Sorry I've been absent but my computer has been offline since early
yesterday morning. Also I would like to know if any of the members of
the Shinsengumi have any descendants that are still alive today?
